properties.body:
EASTERN IONIAN SEA.
GREECE.
HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS.
DNC 09.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS SUNRISE TO SUNSET MONDAYS,
   SUNRISE TO 2100Z TUESDAYS, WEDNESDAYS AND THURSDAYS,
   SUNRISE TO 1000Z FRIDAYS UNTIL 31 DEC EXCEPT
   HOLIDAYS WITHIN FOUR MILES OF 36-42.33N 021-46.50E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 16.
